# meshstack_service_instance (Data Source)

Service instance by instance ID.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "meshstack_service_instance" "example" {
  metadata = {
    instance_id = "my-service-instance-id"
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `metadata` (Attributes) Service instance metadata. Instance ID of the target service instance must be set here. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--metadata))

### Read-Only

- `api_version` (String) Service instance API version.
- `kind` (String) meshObject type, always `meshServiceInstance`.
- `spec` (Attributes) Service instance specification. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--spec))

<a id="nestedatt--metadata"></a>
### Nested Schema for `metadata`

Required:

- `instance_id` (String) Unique identifier of the service instance.

Read-Only:

- `marketplace_identifier` (String) Marketplace identifier.
- `owned_by_project` (String) Project that owns this service instance.
- `owned_by_workspace` (String) Workspace that owns this service instance.


<a id="nestedatt--spec"></a>
### Nested Schema for `spec`

Read-Only:

- `creator` (String) User who created this service instance.
- `display_name` (String) Human-readable display name.
- `plan_id` (String) Service plan identifier.
- `service_id` (String) Service identifier.
